relation: Contains the name of the principal
Contains the password for the principal
pageTitle: Elements in the sun-web.xml File (Sun Java System Web Server 7.0 Update 4 Developer's Guide to Java Web Applications)
textBeforeTable: sun-web-app Subelements Table A–3 The following table describes subelements for the sun-web-app element. Subelements This element Web Server- specific configuration for a web application. This element is the root element. The sun-web.xml file contain only one sun-web-app. sun-web-app Element description Element property Element sun-web-app Element General elements are as follows: General Elements For an alphabetical list of elements in sun-web.xml, see Alphabetical List of sun-web.xml Elements <!DOCTYPE sun-web-app PUBLIC -//Sun Microsystems, Inc.//DTD Application Server 8.1 Servlet 2.5//EN" http://www.sun.com/software/appserver/dtds/sun-web-app_2_4-1.dtd"> Each sun-web.xml file must begin with the following DOCTYPE header: Subelements must be defined in the order in which they are listed in each section, unless otherwise noted. Note – This section also includes an alphabetical list of the elements for quick reference. See Alphabetical List of sun-web.xml Elements. Internationalization Elements JSP Element Classloader Element Caching Elements Reference Elements Session Elements Security Elements General Elements This section describes the XML elements in the sun-web.xml file. Elements are grouped as follows:
textAfterTable: session-config Element zero or one  Specifies the session manager, session cookie, and other session-related information  resource-env-ref Element zero or more  Maps the absolute JNDI name to the resource-env-ref in the corresponding Java EE XML file resource-ref Element zero or more  Maps the absolute JNDI name to the resource-ref in the corresponding Java EE XML file service-ref Element zero or more  Specifies runtime settings for a web service reference  cache Element zero or one  Configures caching for web application components  class-loader Element zero or one  Specifies classloader configuration information  jsp-config Element zero or one  Specifies JSP configuration information  locale-charset-info Element zero or one  Specifies internationalization settings  property Element
